author: Xaunadu
body: When running "Get-Help Stop-Process -examples", the calculator example reads out $p = Get-Crocess -name "calc".

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: Nice catch! This should be filed as an issue in https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs though 🙂

comments.author: Xaunadu
comments.body: Sorry about that. Should I add it on there instead when I get the chance?

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
Absolutely, whenever you can. :)

Or if you prefer, you can submit a PR to the affected documents and change it directly. They're usually pretty quick to look over PRs in that repo as well.

comments.author: Xaunadu
comments.body: Sure thing. Thanks for the info!

title: Typo in Get-Help Stop-Process -examples?
